name: 趙莊敏
objective:
使同學瞭解經濟學的基本觀念及理論，並可利用其作時事議題分析之工具。
主要以個體經濟學的議題為主，包括(1) 供給、需求及供需均衡 (2)彈性的意義，(3)市場效率與公共政策，(4) 消費者及生產者行為等議題之討論
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Tne Principles of Economics
3. Thinking like an Economist
4. Principles of Comparative Advantages
5. Demand
6. Supply
7. Equilibrium
8. Recitation and Reviews
9. Midterm Exam
10. The Elasticity of Demand
11. The Elasticity of Supply
12. Applications of Supply, Demand, and Elasticity
13. Government Policy: Price Controls
14. Government Policy: Taxes
15. Consumer Surplus
16. Producer Surplus
17. Recitation and Reviews
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時成績(讀書報告及課堂練習): 20%
期中考試： 40%
期末考試： 40%
materials: Mankiw, Gregory N., ”Principles of Economics”, 3rd Ed., 新月／東華書局代理。
